hacks.name: NoClip
hacks.desc: Makes the player invincible. (Safe patch.)

hacks.name: No Spikes
hacks.desc: Ignores spike objects

hacks.name: No Hitbox
hacks.desc: Disables all object hitboxes. Special objects are disabled

hacks.name: No Solids
hacks.desc: Disables most solid hitboxes. Special objects still work

hacks.name: Force Block Type
hacks.desc: Treats all objects as if they were blocks

hacks.name: Everything Hurts
hacks.desc: Owie

hacks.name: Freeze Player
hacks.desc: Freezes player movement

hacks.name: Jump Hack
hacks.desc: Allows for jumping in mid-air

hacks.name: Trail Always On
hacks.desc: Sets the trail to either always on or always off

hacks.name: Trail Always Off
hacks.desc: Sets the trail to either always on or always off

hacks.name: Inversed Trail
hacks.desc: Inverses the trail state

hacks.name: Hide Attempts
hacks.desc: Hides the attempt count in-game

hacks.name: Practice Music Hack
hacks.desc: Plays the level's song in-sync with your position, instead of the standard practice song

hacks.name: No Pulse
hacks.desc: Disables pulsing on objects

hacks.name: Ignore ESC
hacks.desc: Stops the ESC key from exiting a level

hacks.name: Suicide
hacks.desc: Kills the player

hacks.name: Accurate Percentage
hacks.desc: Allows for decimals in the level percentage

hacks.name: No Particles
hacks.desc: Disables the particle system (mostly)

hacks.name: Instant Complete
hacks.desc: Teleports the player to the end of a level

hacks.name: Percentage Only
hacks.desc: Hides the progress bar and shows only the percentage at top

hacks.name: Hide Pause Button
hacks.desc: Hides the pause button when the in-game cursor is enabled

hacks.name: No Glow
hacks.desc: Disables objects glow

hacks.name: No Mirror
hacks.desc: Disables mirror portals

hacks.name: Mini Cube Icon
hacks.desc: Forces use of the mini cube icon

hacks.name: No Wave Trail
hacks.desc: Disables the hard wave trail, standard trail remains

hacks.name: Trail Bug Fix
hacks.desc: Fixes trail cutting on high refresh rates

hacks.name: Same Dual Colour
hacks.desc: Gives both icons the same colour combo, not an inverted one in dual mode.

hacks.name: No New Best Popup
hacks.desc: Disable the new best popup

hacks.name: Practice User-Coins
hacks.desc: Allows for user-coins to be picked up in practice mode. Made by WEGFan

hacks.name: No Respawn Flash
hacks.desc: Disables the respawn flash & circle effect.

hacks.name: Coins Show Uncollected
hacks.desc: Forces coins & user-coins show as uncollected

hacks.name: Solid Wave Trail
hacks.desc: No blending on the wave trail, like the black & white trail

hacks.name: No Death Effect
hacks.desc: No visual effects on death

hacks.name: No Force Glow
hacks.desc: Doesn't force a white glow when using black secondary colour

hacks.name: Practice Pulse
hacks.desc: Pulses orbs & wave in practice mode

hacks.name: Corrective Music Sync
hacks.desc: Syncs music properly after unpausing

hacks.name: No Portal Lightning
hacks.desc: Disables portal lightning from size-changing portals

hacks.name: No Spider Dash
hacks.desc: Disables spider dash trail when teleporting
